title: The Icarus wish
brief_description: The awe of flight, the wonder of a bird, the freedom of riding a current of air. Multiple screen images condense the emotions of two boys of different cultures. A jet liner, a bird, a kite and a paper airplane are the segments of this non-verbal adventure in visual literacy.
